name: Peach and Passion Fruit Smash
keywords: ginger root, lime juice, mint leaves, peach nectar
recipeIngredient: 2 ounces ginger root (one 3-inch knob), thinly sliced
1 small bunch mint leaves (reserve 4 of the nicest sprigs for garnish)

recipeInstructions.text: In a small saucepan, combine sugar, 1/4 cup water and ginger root. Simmer until sugar is fully dissolved, about 5 minutes. Let stand, uncovered, 20 minutes. Strain syrup; discard ginger. Cool.

In a cocktail shaker, combine 2 ounces syrup and remaining ingredients except club soda. Shake vigorously. Pour into ice-filled highball glasses. Top with club soda. Serve, garnished with mint sprigs.
